mapper.select:
select cq.xmid,x.qlr qlr,x.qlrzjh zjh,cq.zl,cq.qszt,z.bdcqzh,ly.mc as bz,
cq.jzmj, cq.ghyt,
cq.syqmj jzmj, x.zdzhyt ghyt,
to_char(cq.djsj,'yyyy-MM-dd') djsj, to_char(cq.zxdjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd') zxdjsj
from bdc_fdcq cq
from bdc_jsydsyq cq
join bdc_xm x on x.xmid = cq.XMID join bdc_qlr qlr on qlr.xmid = cq.xmid join bdc_zs z on qlr.zsid = z.zsid left join bdc_zd_xmly ly on x.xmly = ly.dm where qlr.qlrlb = 1 and cq.qszt in (1,2)
and cq.qszt = #{qszt}
and (qlr.zjh like '%' || #{singleZjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or qlr.zjh like '%' || #{singleZjh15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
and qlr.qlrmc like '%' || #{singleQlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and (qlr.zjh in
NULL ) OR qlr.zjh IN (
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
or qlr.zjh in
NULL ) OR qlr.zjh IN (
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
and qlr.qlrmc in
NULL ) OR qlr.qlrmc IN (
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY DECODE(qlr.qlrmc,
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{idx}

sql.if:
select row_number() over(order by msr) as zdyxh, t.msr, t.gmrzjhm, t.jzmj, t2.xmldfh, t.fwyt, to_char(t.basj,'yyyy/MM/dd') basj, t.bdcdyh from fg_htfy t left join fg_fyxx t2 on t.bdcdyh = t2.bdcdyh where t.htbazt = '已备案'
and t.msr like '%' || #{singleMsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and t.gmrzjhm like '%' || #{singleGmrzjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
order by zdyxh asc

mapper.select:
SELECT z.bdcqzh, x.djsj, x.qllx FROM bdc_zs z JOIN bdc_xm_zs_gx zg ON z.zsid = zg.zsid JOIN bdc_xm_lsgx lg ON zg.xmid = lg.yxmid JOIN bdc_xm x ON lg.xmid = x.xmid WHERE
z.bdcqzh in
#{bdcqzh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and x.qllx NOT IN (99, 98, 97, 96, 95,37) ORDER BY x.djsj ASC
0 = 1
